data.name: Blackout Rugby Manager - Deluxe Pack
data.detailed_description:
Contains:
  • 3 Months of Premium - Includes 100 tokens per month, full access to the Assistant Manager, and many other in-game benefits!
  • A deck of cards - containing 20 cards, with at least 2 epic, to use in-game
  • 3 cosmetic shields to spruce up your club (Premium Shield D10, Premium Shield B1, Premium Shield E2)
This pack can only be purchased once per account, and can be redeemed in game under Settings -> DLC

data.short_description: Contains: 3 Months of Premium - Includes in-game benefits, and 100 tokens per month A deck of cards - containing 20 cards, with at least 2 epic, to use in-game. 3 cosmetic shieldsThis pack can only be purchased once per account, and can be redeemed in game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min screen size: 1280x720

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Multi core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
